query.result:
**English:**
1 If ever I continue the sacred poem 2 to which both heaven and earth have set their hand, 3 so that it has made me lean for many years,
4 may the cruelty that shuts me out 5 from the fair fold where I slept as a lamb, 6 an enemy to the wolves that make war on it,
7 be vanquished. With another voice now, with another fleece, 8 I shall return as a poet, and at the font 9 of my baptism I shall take the laurel wreath;
10 for it was in the faith that makes souls known 11 to God that I entered there, and then 12 Peter turned my face toward it.
**Malay:**
1 Jika aku meneruskan puisi suci 2 yang telah diusahakan oleh langit dan bumi, 3 sehingga membuatku kurus selama bertahun-tahun,
4 semoga kekejaman yang mengurungku di luar 5 dari kandang domba yang indah tempat aku tidur sebagai anak domba, 6 musuh bagi serigala yang menyerangnya,
7 dikalahkan. Dengan suara lain sekarang, dengan bulu yang lain, 8 aku akan kembali sebagai penyair, dan di sumber 9 pembaptisanku aku akan mengambil mahkota kemenangan;
10 karena di dalam iman yang membuat jiwa-jiwa dikenal 11 oleh Tuhan, di sanalah aku masuk, dan kemudian 12 Petrus memalingkan wajahku ke arahnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Ma poi che ’l gratular si fu assolto, 26 tacito coram me ciascun s’affisse, 27 ignito sì che vincëa ’l mio volto.
query.result:
**English:**
25 But after the scratching was finished, 26 each one stood silently before me, 27 so brightly that they conquered my face.
**Malay:**
25 Tetapi setelah garukan itu selesai, 26 masing-masing berdiri diam di hadapanku, 27 begitu terang sehingga mereka mengalahkan wajahku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Ridendo allora Bëatrice disse: 29 «Inclita vita per cui la larghezza 30 de la nostra basilica si scrisse,
31 fa risonar la spene in questa altezza: 32 tu sai, che tante fiate la figuri, 33 quante Iesù ai tre fé più carezza».
query.result:
**English:**
28 Then Beatrice said, laughing: 29 "Illustrious life for whom the breadth 30 of our basilica was written,
31 make hope resound at this height: 32 you know that as many times as Jesus showed 33 more affection to the three faithful ones".
**Malay:**
28 Kemudian Beatrice berkata sambil tertawa: 29 "Kehidupan mulia yang untuknya keluasan 30 basilika kita ditulis,
31 buatlah harapan bergema di ketinggian ini: 32 kamu tahu bahwa sebanyak kali Yesus menunjukkan 33 lebih banyak kasih sayang kepada tiga orang yang setia".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 «Leva la testa e fa che t’assicuri: 35 che ciò che vien qua sù del mortal mondo, 36 convien ch’ai nostri raggi si maturi».
query.result:
**English:**
34 "Lift up your head and be assured, 35 for that which comes up here from the mortal world 36 must ripen in our rays."
**Malay:**
34 "Angkatlah kepalamu dan yakinkanlah dirimu: 35 karena apa yang datang ke sini dari dunia fana, 36 haruslah matang dalam sinar kami."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Questo conforto del foco secondo 38 mi venne; ond’ io leväi li occhi a’ monti 39 che li ’ncurvaron pria col troppo pondo.
query.result:
**English:**
37 This comfort from the second fire 38 came to me; whereupon I raised my eyes to the mountains 39 that had bowed them down before with their excessive weight.
**Malay:**
37 Penghiburan dari api kedua ini 38 datang kepadaku; oleh karena itu aku mengangkat mataku ke gunung-gunung 39 yang sebelumnya telah menekuk mereka dengan beban yang berlebihan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 «Poi che per grazia vuol che tu t’affronti 41 lo nostro Imperadore, anzi la morte, 42 ne l’aula più secreta co’ suoi conti,
43 sì che, veduto il ver di questa corte, 44 la spene, che là giù bene innamora, 45 in te e in altrui di ciò conforte,
46 di’ quel ch’ell’ è, di’ come se ne ’nfiora 47 la mente tua, e dì onde a te venne».
query.result:
**English:**
40 “Since by grace it is His will that you confront 41 our Emperor, or rather Death, 42 in the most secret chamber with his counts,
43 so that, having seen the truth of this court, 44 the hope that down there inspires such love 45 may comfort you and others with this knowledge,
46 tell what it is, tell how your mind is adorned 47 with it, and tell where it came to you.”
**Malay:**
40 “Oleh kerana dengan rahmat-Nya Dia menghendaki agar kamu menghadapi 41 Maharaja kita, atau lebih tepatnya Kematian, 42 di dalam bilik yang paling rahsia bersama para pengikutnya,
43 supaya, setelah melihat kebenaran mahkamah ini, 44 harapan, yang di sana di bawah membangkitkan cinta, 45 boleh menghibur kamu dan orang lain dengan pengetahuan ini,
46 katakanlah apakah itu, katakanlah bagaimana fikiran kamu dihiasi 47 dengannya, dan katakanlah dari mana datangnya kepadamu.”

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
48 Così seguì ’l secondo lume ancora.
49 E quella pïa che guidò le penne 50 de le mie ali a così alto volo, 51 a la risposta così mi prevenne:
52 «La Chiesa militante alcun figliuolo 53 non ha con più speranza, com’ è scritto 54 nel Sol che raggia tutto nostro stuolo:
55 però li è conceduto che d’Egitto 56 vegna in Ierusalemme per vedere, 57 anzi che ’l militar li sia prescritto.
query.result:
**English:**
48 Thus I followed the second light again.
49 And that most pious one who guided the feathers 50 of my wings to such a high flight, 51 anticipated me in the response thus:
52 "The Church Militant has no son 53 with greater hope, as it is written 54 in the Sun that radiates over all our host:
55 therefore it is granted to him that from Egypt 56 he may come to Jerusalem to see, 57 before his military service is prescribed for him.
**Malay:**
48 Begitulah aku mengikuti cahaya kedua itu lagi.
49 Dan yang paling saleh yang membimbing bulu-bulu 50 sayapku ke penerbangan yang begitu tinggi, 51 mendahuluiku dalam tanggapan demikian:
52 "Gereja Militan tidak memiliki putra 53 dengan harapan yang lebih besar, seperti yang tertulis 54 di Matahari yang menyinari seluruh pasukan kita:
55 oleh karena itu diberikan kepadanya bahwa dari Mesir 56 ia boleh datang ke Yerusalem untuk melihat, 57 sebelum dinas militernya ditentukan baginya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Li altri due punti, che non per sapere 59 son dimandati, ma perch’ ei rapporti 60 quanto questa virtù t’è in piacere,
61 a lui lasc’ io, ché non li saran forti 62 né di iattanza; ed elli a ciò risponda, 63 e la grazia di Dio ciò li comporti».
query.result:
**English:**
58 The other two points, which are not asked 59 to know, but so that he may relate 60 how much this virtue pleases you,
61 I leave to him, for they will not be strong 62 nor of boasting; and let him answer that, 63 and may the grace of God grant it to him».
**Malay:**
58 Dua perkara yang lain, yang bukan untuk diketahui 59 ditanyakan, tetapi supaya ia menceritakan 60 betapa kebajikan ini menyenangkan Anda,
61 saya serahkan kepadanya, karena itu tidak akan kuat 62 atau sombong; dan biarlah ia menjawab itu, 63 dan semoga rahmat Tuhan mengizinkannya».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Come discente ch’a dottor seconda 65 pronto e libente in quel ch’elli è esperto, 66 perché la sua bontà si disasconda,
67 «Spene», diss’ io, «è uno attender certo 68 de la gloria futura, il qual produce 69 grazia divina e precedente merto.
query.result:
**English:**
64 Like a student who follows a teacher 65 readily and willingly in that which he is expert, 66 so that his goodness may be revealed,
67 "Hope," I said, "is a certain expectation 68 of future glory, which produces 69 divine grace and preceding merit.
**Malay:**
64 Seperti seorang murid yang mengikuti seorang guru 65 dengan segera dan rela dalam hal yang dikuasainya, 66 agar kebaikannya tersingkap,
67 "Harapan," kataku, "adalah penantian yang pasti 68 akan kemuliaan masa depan, yang menghasilkan 69 rahmat ilahi dan pahala yang telah ditentukan sebelumnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Da molte stelle mi vien questa luce; 71 ma quei la distillò nel mio cor pria 72 che fu sommo cantor del sommo duce.
query.result:
**English:**
70 From many stars this light comes to me; 71 but he distilled it in my heart before 72 he was the supreme singer of the supreme leader.
**Malay:**
70 Dari banyak bintang cahaya ini datang kepadaku; 71 tetapi dia menyaringnya di dalam hatiku sebelum 72 dia menjadi penyanyi agung dari pemimpin agung.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 ‘Sperino in te’, ne la sua tëodia 74 dice, ‘color che sanno il nome tuo’: 75 e chi nol sa, s’elli ha la fede mia?
76 Tu mi stillasti, con lo stillar suo, 77 ne la pistola poi; sì ch’io son pieno, 78 e in altrui vostra pioggia repluo».
query.result:
**English:**
73 ‘I hope in you’, in his theology 74 he says, ‘those who know your name’: 75 and who does not know it, if he has my faith?
76 You distilled me, with his distilling, 77 then in the phial; so that I am full, 78 and in others I rain down your rain».
**Malay:**
73 ‘Aku berharap padamu’, dalam teologinya 74 katanya, ‘mereka yang tahu nama-Mu’: 75 dan siapa yang tidak tahu, jika dia memiliki imanku?
76 Engkau menyulingku, dengan penyulingannya, 77 kemudian dalam botol; sehingga aku penuh, 78 dan pada orang lain aku menghujankan hujan-Mu».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Mentr’ io diceva, dentro al vivo seno 80 di quello incendio tremolava un lampo 81 sùbito e spesso a guisa di baleno.
query.result:
**English:**
79 While I was speaking, within the living core 80 of that fire a flash of lightning trembled 81 suddenly and often like a thunderbolt.
**Malay:**
79 Ketika aku berkata, di dalam inti yang hidup 80 dari api itu bergetar kilatan cahaya 81 tiba-tiba dan sering seperti halilintar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Indi spirò: «L’amore ond’ ïo avvampo 83 ancor ver’ la virtù che mi seguette 84 infin la palma e a l’uscir del campo,
85 vuol ch’io respiri a te che ti dilette 86 di lei; ed emmi a grato che tu diche 87 quello che la speranza ti ’mpromette».
query.result:
**English:**
82 Then he breathed: "The love with which I burn 83 still toward the virtue that follows me 84 even to the palm and to the exit from the field,
85 wants me to breathe to you who delight 86 in her; and it pleases me that you say 87 what hope promises you."
**Malay:**
82 Kemudian dia bernafas: "Cinta yang dengannya aku berkobar 83 masih terhadap kebajikan yang mengikutiku 84 bahkan sampai ke telapak tangan dan ke pintu keluar lapangan,
85 ingin agar aku bernafas kepadamu yang senang 86 padanya; dan aku senang bahwa kamu mengatakan 87 apa yang harapan janjikan kepadamu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result:

**Malay:**

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Poscia tra esse un lume si schiarì 101 sì che, se ’l Cancro avesse un tal cristallo, 102 l’inverno avrebbe un mese d’un sol dì.
query.result:
**English:**
100 Then among them a light became clear, 101 so that, if Cancer had such a crystal, 102 winter would have a month of only one day.
**Malay:**
100 Kemudian di antara mereka sebuah cahaya menjadi terang, 101 sehingga, jika Cancer memiliki kristal seperti itu, 102 musim dingin akan memiliki satu bulan hanya satu hari.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 E come surge e va ed entra in ballo 104 vergine lieta, sol per fare onore 105 a la novizia, non per alcun fallo,
106 così vid’ io lo schiarato splendore 107 venire a’ due che si volgieno a nota 108 qual conveniesi al loro ardente amore.
query.result:
**English:**
103 And as she rises and goes and enters the dance, 104 a happy maiden, only to do honor 105 to the new bride, not for any fault,
106 so I saw the bright splendor 107 come to the two who turn to each other 108 as is fitting for their ardent love.
**Malay:**
103 Dan ketika dia bangkit dan pergi dan memasuki tarian, 104 seorang gadis yang gembira, hanya untuk memberi penghormatan 105 kepada pengantin baru, bukan karena kesalahan apa pun,
106 maka kulihat cahaya terang 107 datang kepada keduanya yang saling berpaling 108 sebagaimana layaknya cinta mereka yang membara.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Misesi lì nel canto e ne la rota; 110 e la mia donna in lor tenea l’aspetto, 111 pur come sposa tacita e immota.
query.result:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

**Malay:**

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 La donna mia così; né però piùe 116 mosser la vista sua di stare attenta 117 poscia che prima le parole sue.
query.result:
**English:**
115 My lady did the same; but she did not 116 move her gaze from being attentive 117 after her first words.
**Malay:**

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Qual è colui ch’adocchia e s’argomenta 119 di vedere eclissar lo sole un poco, 120 che, per veder, non vedente diventa;
121 tal mi fec’ ïo a quell’ ultimo foco 122 mentre che detto fu: «Perché t’abbagli 123 per veder cosa che qui non ha loco?
124 In terra è terra il mio corpo, e saragli 125 tanto con li altri, che ’l numero nostro 126 con l’etterno proposito s’agguagli.
query.result:
**English:**
118 Like one who strains his eyes and strives 119 to see a solar eclipse a little, 120 who, in order to see, becomes sightless;
121 so I became at that final fire, 122 while it was said: "Why do you dazzle yourself 123 in order to see that which has no place here?
124 On earth my body is earth, and it will be 125 with the others, until our number 126 is equal to the eternal plan.
**Malay:**
118 Seperti orang yang memaksakan matanya dan berusaha 119 untuk melihat gerhana matahari sedikit, 120 yang, untuk melihat, menjadi buta;
121 begitulah yang kulakukan pada api terakhir itu, 122 sementara dikatakan: "Mengapa kamu menyilaukan dirimu sendiri 123 untuk melihat sesuatu yang tidak ada di sini?
124 Di bumi, tubuhku adalah tanah, dan akan menjadi 125 bersama yang lain, sampai jumlah kita 126 sama dengan rencana abadi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Con le due stole nel beato chiostro 128 son le due luci sole che saliro; 129 e questo apporterai nel mondo vostro».
query.result:
**English:**
127 With the two garlands in the blessed cloister 128 are the two only lights that ascended; 129 and this you will bring back to your world."
**Malay:**
127 Dengan dua kalungan bunga di biara yang diberkati 128 adalah dua cahaya tunggal yang naik; 129 dan ini akan kamu bawa kembali ke duniamu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 A questa voce l’infiammato giro 131 si quïetò con esso il dolce mischio 132 che si facea nel suon del trino spiro,
133 sì come, per cessar fatica o rischio, 134 li remi, pria ne l’acqua ripercossi, 135 tutti si posano al sonar d’un fischio.
query.result:
**English:**
130 At this voice the fiery circle 131 became quiet, along with the sweet mingling 132 that was made in the sound of the threefold breath,
133 just as, to cease toil or danger, 134 the oars, before striking the water again, 135 all come to rest at the sound of a whistle.
**Malay:**
130 Mendengar suara itu, lingkaran api 131 menjadi tenang bersama alunan lembut 132 yang tercipta dalam alunan napas rangkap tiga,
133 seperti, untuk menghentikan kerja keras atau bahaya, 134 dayung-dayung, sebelum kembali mendayung di air, 135 semuanya berhenti saat mendengar suara peluit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
136 Ahi quanto ne la mente mi commossi, 137 quando mi volsi per veder Beatrice, 138 per non poter veder, benché io fossi
139 presso di lei, e nel mondo felice!
query.result:
**English:**
136 Ah, how much I was moved in my mind, 137 when I turned to see Beatrice, 138 because I could not see her, although I was
139 near her, and in the happy world!
**Malay:**
136 Ah, betapa aku sangat tersentuh dalam pikiranku, 137 ketika aku berpaling untuk melihat Beatrice, 138 karena aku tidak dapat melihatnya, meskipun aku
139 dekat dengannya, dan di dunia yang bahagia!
